languages.text: "Эти слова и правда звучали в наших разговорах. Личных разговорах".
"Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."
languages.original_text: "Эти слова и правда звучали в наших разговорах. Личных разговорах".

traits.locale_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."
"Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."
"Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."
"Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."
"Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

languages.text: "Diese Worte wurden in unseren Unterhaltungen tatsächlich gesagt. Unseren privaten Unterhaltungen."
languages.original_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Worte wurden in unseren Unterhaltungen tatsächlich gesagt. Unseren privaten Unterhaltungen."

languages.text: « Ces mots ont effectivement été prononcés lors de nos conversations. De nos conversations privées, oserais-je même ajouter. »
languages.original_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

traits.locale_text: « Ces mots ont effectivement été prononcés lors de nos conversations. De nos conversations privées, oserais-je même ajouter. »

languages.text: “这些话我们确实说过，是在非常私密的场合说出来的。”
languages.original_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

traits.locale_text: “这些话我们确实说过，是在非常私密的场合说出来的。”

languages.text: «En efecto, esas palabras se pronunciaron en nuestras conversaciones. En nuestras conversaciones privadas».
languages.original_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

traits.locale_text: «En efecto, esas palabras se pronunciaron en nuestras conversaciones. En nuestras conversaciones privadas».

languages.text: 「確かにその言葉は{mf|俺|私}たちの会話の中で交わされた。{mf|俺|私}たちの内緒の会話の中で」
languages.original_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

traits.locale_text: 「確かにその言葉は{mf|俺|私}たちの会話の中で交わされた。{mf|俺|私}たちの内緒の会話の中で」

languages.text: "Bunlar sahiden de konuştuğumuz şeyler. Özel konuştuğumuz şeyler."
languages.original_text: "Those words were indeed spoken in our conversations. Our private conversations."

traits.locale_text: "Bunlar sahiden de konuştuğumuz şeyler. Özel konuştuğumuz şeyler."
